name: Bisyntho
description:
Twelve orbs, one bin. Can you reach Mr. Sunglasses before you run out of space?

Easy to pickup,

When two identical orbs touch, they merge into a bigger one, opening space for more orbs!

Hard to master!

Exploit combos, holding, and directional bouncing to push your high score beyond what your friends even consider possible!

Loads of custom game modes!

Whether you want a harder challenge, unique mechanics, or just to switch it up, there's a mode for you! Find your favorite and show the world why you're the best.

Customize your experience!

Unlock a variety of cosmetics to create your own unique style!
